content.about:
About the deal

Visiting a microbrewery and having fresh beer straight out of the machine has become a style statement among bangaloreans. And why not? It’s freshly brewed beer. Microbreweries are a trend. Vgulp presents this deal for you to experience a microbrewery. Have food, and the beer comes for free. GET 2 330 ML PINTS FREE WHEN YOU EAT FOR 1500/- at Barleyz – The Brew House, Koramangala. Undoubtedly, one of the best breweries, and the most happening joints in Koramangala. Spread in 2 floors including an open terrace on the top, Barleyz is a sight to see.

  • Offer valid only on all days
  • The Restaurant may get crowded, check in advance
  • Only 2 330 ml pints will be supplied for free, extra will be charged
  • Present your voucher in email on your phone
  • You must be over the legal drinking age in your city to redeem this voucher against drinks/liquor. Please do not abuse alcohol.
  • Cannot be redeemed with cash
  • Please do not print to waste paper, unless absolutely necessary
